column4: hello my friends, i am stuck in a very low resolution after a game crashed, can anyone please suggest how i can reset to a higher res in terminal?
i tried using the standard gui but it annoyingly won't let me drag it up as my resolution is smaller than the change resolution window
have you tried logging out and back in or rebooting?
no i was trying to avoid tha
this is a high reliability machine that i happen to play games on
that is a shallow exscuse I must say. ;)
i can't reset the resolution on command line?
i thought we were geeks here, work with me
xrandr -s XXxXX you out in the resoultion
but that is not installed by default, so what is the existing dialog using to set it?
you don't have to install xrandr
